instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.message:
Hi, 
No green led, no work on battery
PPBUS_G3H=12,28V
R7022=10ohm
R7021=10
R7051=2,5
R7052=0
SMC_PM_G2_EN=0V
PP3V3_S5=0V
SMC_ONOF=3,4V
is it the SMC?
thanks
SMC not running. SMC_RESET high? Corrosion under SMC?

SMC_RESET is high 3,439V
No corrosion near smc, how do you see under, i remove it? and reball?
thanks
apply some flux and heat SMC, this will in some cases, get the crap out, if dont, you need to remove and reball or remove and relace SMC.... Do you know how this happen???? Any history???
